projects.title: Oward - Full-Stack Platform & Mobile App
projects.description: Led full-stack development of a comprehensive TypeScript platform with React, Next.js (SSR), and Loopback backend. Developed and maintained PostgreSQL database with TypeORM, implemented comprehensive testing with Jest, and created TypeScript scripts for robots.txt optimization. Significantly improved SEO strategy and online visibility. Built and launched a cross-platform mobile application using React Native (iOS, Android & PWA), delivering a seamless user experience across all platforms.

projects.title: LSA - Restaurant Ordering Mobile App
projects.description: Developed a complete Android mobile and PWA ordering application for restaurant staff using Capacitor with Angular 17. Managed the entire project lifecycle from conception to delivery, working closely with the client to ensure requirements were met. Built a robust GraphQL backend with Hasura, enabling real-time order management and seamless data synchronization. The application improved operational efficiency for restaurant staff.

projects.title: Ata-Electronics - Complete Platform Redesign
projects.description: Executed a complete frontend redesign and architecture overhaul for an enterprise application using Angular 16. Created new pages, components, and established a scalable project architecture. Implemented bug fixes and performance optimizations. Developed robust backend solutions with Node.js and vanilla MySQL, deployed on AWS infrastructure. Delivered a modern, maintainable codebase that improved both user experience and developer productivity.

projects.title: JFVELEC - SEO Strategy & Next.js Optimization
projects.description: Provided comprehensive SEO consulting services including competitive analysis, strategy research and development, and performance monitoring. Optimized and modified an existing Next.js project to significantly improve search engine rankings. Conducted thorough technical audits, implemented SEO best practices, and delivered measurable improvements in organic visibility and website performance.

projects.title: FDJ United - React Feature Development
projects.description: Developed new features and resolved critical bugs for a large-scale React application integrated with Drupal CMS. Worked with TypeScript to ensure type safety and code quality. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions that met business requirements. Maintained and improved existing codebase while implementing modern React best practices.
